FAQ

Get answers to your frequently asked questions

Using the Service

  • How do I start using the service?
    Visit the Get Started page to sign-up, manage your alert settings and start your free trial
  • Where does the exchange rate information come from?
    We use the publicly available pricing data from Coinbase
  • Are other cryptocurrencies other than ETH supported?
    Yes! We also support BTC and LTC. If you'd like us to look into tracking other currencies, email us at info@cryptck.com
  • I don't live in the US. Are there different phone numbers?
    Not Yet, but we're working on it
  • What is the phone number?
    1 (323) 593-CRYP or (1 (323) 593-2797)
  • What actions use a credit?
    You are deducted when the currency you are tracking crosses your defined threshold or you use the 'status' keyword. All other commands (such as 'every', 'help' or 'stop') don't deduct a credit
  • What happens when I run out of credits?
    You can purchase more credits here. Otherwise, we will no longer contact you with notifications.

Your Account

  • Is this a free service?
    Unfortunatley, we can't support the service for free (because we still have to pay the bills). We give everyone 25 free credits to try the service. At the end of the trial, we hope you decide to support the expansion of cryptck by becoming a paying customer. That being said, we are pretty flexible if you feel like you need more time to decide. Just shoot us an email at info@cryptck.com and we'll work something out with you
  • How do I add credits to my account?
    Visit our buy credits page to get a code. Once you enter your payment information, you'll receive a code. Text "add {your code}" to (323) 593-2797.
  • Is it safe to give my credit card information?
    Yes; we use the latest encryption technology to ensure your financial information is safe. Our payment processor is PCI certified.
  • How do I cancel My Account?
    Just text the word STOP to 1 (323) 593-2797 and we'll unsubscribe you from the service.
